attributes.magic: PE32+ executable (console) x86-64, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE JS/Nemucod.M.gen downloading EXE payload
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE JS/Nemucod.M.gen downloading EXE payload"; flow:from_server,established; flowbits:isset,ET.nemucod.exerequest; file_data; content:"MZ"; within:2; byte_jump:4,58,relative,little; content:"PE|00 00|"; fast_pattern; distance:-64; within:4; reference:url,www.certego.net/en/news/italian-spam-campaigns-using-js-nemucod-downloader/; reference:md5,0bc86ab7ead67e264531ccb16c3c529a; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2021954; rev:2; metadata:created_at 2015_10_15, malware_family JS_Nemucod_M_gen, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2019_07_26;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Possible Malicious Macro DL EXE Feb 2016"; flow:established,to_server; http.method; content:"GET"; http.uri; content:".exe"; nocase; endswith; fast_pattern; pcre:"/(?:\/(?:(?:p(?:lugins\/content\/vote\/\.ssl\/[a-z0-9]|a(?:nel\/includes\/[^\x2f]+|tric)|o(?:sts?\/[a-z0-9]+|ny[a-z]*)|rogcicicic|m\d{1,2})|s(?:ystem\/(?:logs|engine)\/[^\x2f]+?|e(?:rv(?:au|er)|ct)|vchost[^\x2f]*|gau\/.*?|alam|ucks|can|ke)|(?=[a-z]*[0-9])(?=[0-9]*[a-z])(?!setup\d+\.exe$)[a-z0-9]{5,10}|in(?:voice(?:\/[^\x2f]+|[^\x2f]*)|st\d+|fos?)|a(?:d(?:min\/images\/\w+|obe)|salam|live|us)|m(?:edia\/files\/\w+|a(?:cros?|rch)|soffice)|d(?:o(?:c(?:\/[a-z0-9]+)?|ne)|bust)|(?:~.+?\/\.[^\x2f]+|\.css)\/.+?|c(?:onfig|hris|alc)|u(?:swinz\w+|pdate)|xml\/load\/[^\x2f]+|(?:[Dd]ocumen|ve)t|Ozonecrytedserver|w(?:or[dk]|insys)|t(?:mp\/.+?|est)|fa(?:cture|soo)|n(?:otepad|ach)|k(?:be|ey|is)|ArfBtxz|office|yhaooo|[a-z]|etna|link|\d+)\.exe$|(?:(?=[a-z0-9]*?[3456789][a-z0-9]*?[3456789])(?=[a-z0-9]*?[h-z])[a-z0-9]{3,31}\+|PasswordRecovery|RemoveWAT|Dejdisc|Host\d+|Msword)\.exe)|(?:^\/(?:image\/.+?\/[^\x2f]+|x\/setup)|[\x2f\s]order|keem)\.exe$)/i"; http.user_agent; content:"Mozilla/4.0 (compatible|3b 20|MSIE 7.0|3b 20|Windows NT"; http.host; content:!"7zip.org"; content:!".bloomberg.com"; content:!".bitdefender.com"; content:!".microsoft.com"; endswith; http.accept; content:"*/*"; depth:3; endswith; http.accept_enc; content:"gzip, deflate"; depth:13; endswith; http.header_names; content:"|0d 0a|Accept|0d 0a|"; depth:10; content:!"Referer"; content:!"Cookie"; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2022550; rev:21; metadata:affected_product MS_Office, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2016_02_19, deployment Perimeter, malware_family MalDocGeneric, performance_impact Moderate, confidence Medium, signature_severity Major, tag MalDoc, updated_at 2024_05_01;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may steal data by exfiltrating it over an un-encrypted network protocol other than that of the existing command and control channel.
The data may also be sent to an alternate network location from the main command and control server.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: ADS Zone.Identifier Deleted By Uncommon Application
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the deletion of the "Zone.Identifier" ADS by an uncommon process. Attackers can leverage this in order to bypass security restrictions that make use of the ADS such as Microsoft Office apps.
Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
